  • Uses of ITrap in com.university.elements.traps

    Classes in com.university.elements.traps that implement ITrap
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    CutieCat
    Represents a special trap: CutieCat, which immobilizes the player until it is fed.
    class 
    MadScientists
    Represents the "Mad Scientists" trap in the game The trap involves a group of scientists who trap the player by talking constantly about their experiments The player becomes stuck in the room until they use a specific strategy to escape
    class 
    Trap
    Represents a generic trap in the game that can immobilize the player The trap can be escaped by using specific strategies or items
